foods.name: Pizza
foods.recipe: 1. Prepare dough. 2. Add sauce and cheese. 3. Bake in oven.

foods.name: Burger
foods.recipe: 1. Grill the beef patty. 2. Assemble with bun, lettuce, and tomato. 3. Serve with fries.

foods.name: Pasta
foods.recipe: 1. Cook pasta. 2. Prepare Alfredo sauce. 3. Mix pasta with sauce and serve.
